class COFnWrap

Detailed Description

Connection class.

This class handles a connection to a CrossObject broker. It handles all incoming messages, records all state information and holds all registered classes/objects.

meta::MetaObject cobject::Connection::RegisterObject ( const meta::MetaObject &  obj  ) 

Register an object with the broker.

Parameters:
obj The object to register
Returns:
A call-proxy for the registered object - initially this will be the only reference to the object in existence, so it must be kept until another reference (i.e. in another application) can be created.
